data.title: Young American Creative Patriotic Art Contest
data.meta_description: The VFW Auxiliary's Young American Creative Patriotic Art Contest is an art scholarship contest open to students in grades 9-12. Learn more here.
data.text: Each year, more than 4,000 high school students from across the country participate in the VFW Auxiliaryâ€™s Young American Creative Patriotic Art Contest. The contest began in 1979 to recognize up-and-coming artists and encourage patriotism in youth. View the current National state winners or all the previous first-place national winners for Young American Creative Patriotic Art. This contest comprises only two-dimensional entries. The 3-Dimensional Patriotic Art Contest is exclusively for three-dimensional art pieces. Click here to see the current National state winners for this contest.
